column1: Lily Baggins was Hobbits of the Shire.
Lily was the fifth and youngest child of Balbo Baggins and Berylla Baggins. She married Togo Goodbody and had many (unknown) descendants.
A lily is a plant of the wikipedia:Lilium genus
column2: or to visually similar plants. It derives from Greek λείριον through Latin
column3: ultimately of ancient Egyptian origin.http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/lily Wiktionary entry
